Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or serve as an outstanding tool for your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10000. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
